name: PR1N7
description:
PR1N7 is a singleplayer 2.5D puzzle-platform game. You are a 3D Printer who refuses to work more for his masters and tries to escape the factory complex. To accomplish this, you will copy yourself to replicate your moves and help yourself to find the exit.

BETA RELEASE

Now we're focusing on polish gameplay, art, and mechanics.

For next iterations, we're aiming to add background elements and animations to all levels, define thematic worlds with new levels, and update all sound/music placeholders.

HELP US

We are constantly searching for feedback. Feel free to leave a comment here or reach us in our twitter account @Pr1n7V.

THE TEAM

First-year game dev students at ENTI-UB. This is our first project as a team.

  • Sergio Murillo Méndez (@SergioMuMe)
  • Marc Caymel Rodríguez (@Kaymi13)
  • Roger Buján Adell (@Gerch0s)
